Plan to use a consultant (Scott Perkins) to eval site.  12/12/17-call w/ D.S-he will send consultant's report. 2/20/18-email to D.S. inquiring about meeting. 3/19/18-meeting w/ Perkins & Summerlin - they said they'd send site eval plan & documentation of HW RTC w/in a few weeks. 5/22/18-email to D.S. requesting update. 5/31/18-response says will send plan soon. 6/1/18-plan received.7/17/18-call with Scott Perkins-discussed plan; 10/23/18-revisions received. 12/11/18-sent email to Perkins requesting update. 3/6/19-Perkins said investigation report will be done next week. 4/10/19-recv'd investigation report.  4/25/19-ERP & order to Nelson. 5/22/19 ERP & order approved. 5/28/19-draft CO to RP. 5/28/19-RCRAInfo 208 form sent. 6/25/19-meeting @10am; 6/28/19- rev'sd order sent. 7/2/19-email inquiry to Dan S. asking for response to rev'sd draft order-responded with no more changes. 7/5/19-inquiry from AC re App A; 7/30/19-left vm for consultant re inquiry. 7/31/19-vm from C.Marsh-order expected to be signed 8/2/19. 8/1/19-mtg w/ C.Marsh to discuss cover requirements. 8/2/19-RJ Lackey requested ABLE analysis. 8/5/19-ABLE request form sent to Leslie Beckwith.  9/17/19-discussed ABLE app w/Josiah-told him compliance is a priority over civil charge in ABLE analysis & that we could extend closure period if necessary based on analysis results. 10/7/19-ABLE & beyond ABLE analysis memo.  10/8/19-revised ERP to Justin-approved same day.  10/17-19-revised ERP approved.  10/17/19-revised order w/o civil charge sent to RJ Lackey. Email response from Lackey indicates that company may need to extend closure completion deadline later than August 31, 2020. 5/21/20-called-company filed bankruptcy Feb2020. Facility was purchased by Ison Furniture. Waste area side not purchased and under bankruptcy trustee.

Email response to NOV 2/18/19. Meeting 3/5/19. Draft ERP: comments by Nicole on 3/6/19; sent to Justin 3/6/19 - concurrence 3/13/19; sent to Nelson for review & approval 3/13/19.  Draft order sent to Nicole 3/7/19. ERP approved 3/19/19. Followup to Nicole 4/9/19.  5/14/19 meeting with Becky, Nicole, Jenny.  Sent draft order for comment to Becky, Nicole, Jenny on 5/14/19 & made suggested change on 5/14/19 & sent to Nelson for review and approval; approved 5/22/19. Draft CO sent to RP 5/28/19. Followup phone call 6/18/19.Meeting 6/27/19.  Revised draft order sent 6/27/19 with civil charge offer of $28,245.00.  Meeting 8/6/19 - discussed SEP & agreed to wait 30 days for SEP proposal.  Sent email with mtg summary to Omnisource on 8/6/19. Received SEP proposals 9/10/19; left voicemail for James Winegar on 9/17/19 to say that none of the proposals seem approvable & invited him to submit any additional proposals they may have. Phone conversation with James Winegar (919-796-3023 mobile) on 9/24/19 - explained why SEP proposals are not acceptable. Discussed potential SEP for Omnisource funding County-led cleanup of abandoned site - he will get back with me next week on this.  Voicemail on 10/4/19 says company has preliminary management approval for SEP concept & is talking with County & will get back to me in a week. Email followup to Winegar 10/16/19.  10/24/19 email from Winegar says Rocky Mt. may have abandoned sites to propose. 5/21/19-Tim Fletcher called Winegar to follow up on SEP-left message. 5/28/19-call from James Winegar. No SEP selected. 6/4/20-J Winegar submitted compliance docs. No SEP selected as of 11/18/2020. 12/4/20 Draft ERP/PenCalcs/CSO to Nelson for review. 2/16/21: Draft ERP and CSO approved. 2/17/21: CSO emailed to James Winegar. 3/18/21: Revised CSO (no SEP) sent for review.

3/11/20: NOV issued. 3/18/20: Mark Pinkard responded to NOV and held conference call. 3/18/20: Mark emailed records for review. 4/6/20: Mark emailed records for review. 4/22/20: DEQ inspection staff reviewed submitted records and determined compliance has been achieved. 7/22/20: Enf docs to Kerri Nicholas for review. 7/30/20: Enf docs back from Kerri Nicholas to Tim Fletcher. 11/19/20: Revised enf docs to Nelson for review. 3/11/21: Kerri and Nelson have reviewed and approved ERP. Need to revise and submit draft CSO for review.

10/21/2020: Called Mr. Nawaz (571-232-3828)  to let him know Quick CSO is going to be sent to him. Email is nawaz.law@gmail.com and mailing address is 42395 Ryan Rd. #112-618, Ashburn, VA 20148. Google returns this as box #618 at the UPS Store. CSO to Mahmood Nawaz by email 11/4/20 and mail 11/5/20. No response as of 12/4/20. Draft Referral for APA Action to Nelson for review 12/4/20. 11/4/2021: UST inspection. 11/16/21: NOV #2 issued.

6/16/20:Draft ERP and Pen Calcs to Nelson for review. 6/23/20:Spoke with D. Patadia. Rick Trogdon to submit records resolving compliance issues. 7/7/20;Emailed D Patadia about not receiving compliance records. 7/22/20: Compliance records received from Rick Trogdon.10/21/20:Draft QCSO to Nelson for review. 11/5/20: Draft std Pen Calc wksht sent to Nelson for clarity on QCSO.

6/3/20:NOV issued. 7/27/20:Draft ERP and Pen Calcs to Nelson for review. 10/14/20:Updated NOV with more SSOs issued. 9/29/21: Lawrence Hoffman responded to NOVs indicating that Christiansburg did not receive them. 10/12/21: Conf. call between Christiansburg, CHA, and DEQ. 12/17/21: Revised enf. docs to Nelson for review. 1/7/22: NOV with more SSOs issued.
11/11/20: Jeff Pack NOV response email. 12/16/20:Draft ERP and Pen Calcs to Nelson.

12/7/20:Contacted by RP to schedule conf. call. 12/09/20:RP response to NOV submitted. 12/17/20:Conf. call with RP. 1/19/21: Draft ERP and Pen Calcs to Nelson. 1/21/21: Email from Mark Popovich. 1/26/21: Email response to Mark Popovich. 3/31/21: Temp authorization for daily waste increase issued. 8/20/2021: NOV-21-08-BRRO-001 issued for separate issues. 8/31/2021: Conf. call held with RP.

1/26/21: Called Jason Edwards (434-369-6633 x122). Left message to call me. 2/16/21: Spoke with Jason. Said he'd send compliance records on 2/17. 2/22/21: Nothing received from RP. Draft ERP/Pen Calcs sent to Nelson for review.

2/17/21: Spoke with Dhiren Muni. Said he'd send SIR reports on 2/22. Followed up with email. 2/23/21: Muni csent in SIR records for Tanks 4 and 5. Emailed him and asked him for SIR records for prior months. No response has been received since the initial SIR reports submitted. LOA drafted for review 6/24/2021.

4/29/2021: No response from RP. Mark Coppage recommends calling Clay Samples, Water Plant Superintendent. 434-579-2564. 7/15/2021: Phone call with Clay Samples. 7/16/2021: Draft LOA sent to Nelson for review. Drafting CSO with App A to resolve compliance issues. 9/20/2021: Email to Mr. Crews about compliance plan. 11/5/2021: Emailed Mr. Crews again about compliance plan for lagoon. 12/8/2021: NOV W2021-11-B-0001 issued to Town of Brookneal. 1/7/2022: NOV W2021-12-B-0003 issued to Town of Brookneal. 12/2/2021: RP sent a letter stating that they've figured out how to release without triggering TSS issues. 1/24/2022: RP sent a letter stating tht they're going to use barley straw to control algae growth.
3/10/21: Sam Patel called to set up call with Dan (Dharmendra) his father. 3/16/21: Call with Dan and Sam Patel. Sent some compliance records.

3/10/21: Sam Patel called to set up call with Dan (Dharmendra) his father. 3/16/21: Call with Dan and Sam Patel. Sent some compliance records. 3/17/21: More compliance records received. Nicole McFaden confirmed that the RD compliance portion was resolved. 3/25/21: More records submitted through VITAShare. 9/23/2021: Tim Petrie formal inspection of site. RCA issued at inspection.
3/10/21: Sam Patel called to set up call with Dan (Dharmendra) his father. Will email me with proposed time/date.
4/12/21: Email from John Morgan responding to NOV. Has installed silt fence and working on sed. basin. Hired Shane Foushee to draft plans.

column13: 6/21/2021: Conf. call with Chales Williams/Gentry Locke and Michael Deneka. Need to proceed with Ability to Pay.

10/18/21: Emailed Ronnie Wilson, Swing Pres. Brad Durham called and left message. Called him back. Brad thinks that their contractor, James Environmental, has changed their DMR process and they now put them on a server for his review/approval before submitting to the DEQ. 10/25/2021: eDMRs submitted for review.
11/22/2021: Frank Cappiello called and left a message. 12/2/21: Spoke with Mr. Cappiello on the phone. He plans to look into permantly closing the USTs.
